description: This file defines API routes for managing device configurations, including creating/updating ('upsert') and listing configurations for specific devices. It uses FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM to interact with the database.

methods.name: ConfigOut upsert_device_config(device_id: int, payload: ConfigUpsert, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Creates or updates a device configuration entry based on device ID and payload.

methods.name: List[ConfigOut] list_device_configs(device_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves all configuration entries for a specific device.

ctags.name: list_device_configs
ctags.pattern: /^def list_device_configs(device_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_cur/
ctags.signature: (device_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: upsert_device_config
ctags.pattern: /^def upsert_device_config(device_id: int, payload: ConfigUpsert, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _/
ctags.signature: (device_id: int, payload: ConfigUpsert, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))
